mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prescription ( prescription_execute_state, prescription_type, prescription_user_id, prescription_doctor_id, prescription_register_info_id, prescription_name) VALUES (#{prescription_execute_state},#{prescription_type},#{prescription_user_id}, #{prescription_doctor_id},#{prescription_register_info_id},#{prescription_name})
mapper.update: UPDATE prescription SET prescription_execute_state = #{prescription_execute_state} WHERE prescription_id = #{prescription_id}
UPDATE prescription SET prescription_fee = #{prescription_fee} WHERE prescription_id = #{prescription_id}
UPDATE prescription SET prescription_name = #{prescription_name} WHERE prescription_id = #{prescription_id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT patient_info.* FROM patient_info,register_info,prescription WHERE patient_record_id = register_info_patient_id AND register_info_id = prescription.prescription_register_info_id AND prescription_execute_state = #{prescription_execute_state}
